title: Vanity's Fiend is face-up on my opponent's field. In this situation, can I activate Wild Fire?
question: Vanity's Fiend is face-up on my opponent's field. In this situation, can I activate Wild Fire?
answer: In this scenario, while the effect of Vanity's Fiend is applying, Wild Fire cannot be activated.
llm_answer: Yes, you can activate Wild Fire. The restriction from Vanity's Fiend prevents Special Summoning, but does not stop the activation of card effects. The scenario will resolve as follows: Wild Fire will destroy all "Blaze Accelerator" cards you control, then destroy as many monsters on the field as possible, and finally attempt to Special Summon a "Wild Fire Token," which will fail due to Vanity's Fiend's effect.
